text: ku banda anak( del yeung ban sanyea tha chuoy puokke) brasen bae yeung ban phdal setthi amnach aoy puokke now leu phendei nih puokke ban brate b tde sa lat ning ban brichcheak hsaa kat promteang ban brae knea aoy thveu brakear la ning ban hamkhat knea ampi brakear akrak haey lotthophl chongokraoy nei kechchakar teangoasa ku vilotralb tow rk a l laoh vinh
